summary: In one of the most extraordinary nights in the history of Egypt, the prisons were suddenly opened, leaving thousands of prisoners wandering the desert. Among them was one man trying to find... See full summary Â»
cast: Asser Yassin|Amr Abed|Muhammad Mamdooh|Mona Sheimy|Seif El Aswany|Sondos Shabayek|Latifa Fahmy|Yara Gubran|Atef Yousef
title: Farsh wa Ghata
